match(ConcreteResourceSet) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.resources.resourceSets.SpendableResourceSet
match checks whether a given ConcreteResourceSet matches the ChoiceResourceSet in this SpendableResourceSet Note that the check is made assuming that all ChoiceResources in a SpendableResourceSet have a FullChoiceSet to choose from
